question: {name} wants to make different sized ice cubes with {n} {unit}s of water. He can make giant cubes that use {w1} {unit}s per cube, medium cubes that use {w2} {unit}s, and small cubes that use {w3} of {unit}. If he makes {n1} giant cubes, {n3} small cubes, and {n2} medium cubes, how many {unit}s of water does he have left?
